methods.name: getActionBarPriority
methods.rawdescription:
Defines priority for single action bar item of bar items that has the 'timecontext' groupId.
Widgets that uses WidgetTimeContextComponent can be assigned to three levels of priority:
HIGH priority means that widget is using time range pickers, realtime and aggregation features.
Widgets: Data points graph, Data points graph 2.0, Data points table.
MEDIUM priority means that widget is using time range pickers and realtime features.
Widgets: Event list.
LOW priority means that widget is using realtime feature only.
Widgets: Map
methods.description: Defines priority for single action bar item of bar items that has the 'timecontext' groupId. Widgets that uses WidgetTimeContextComponent can be assigned to three levels of priority: HIGH priority means that widget is using time range pickers, realtime and aggregation features. Widgets: Data points graph, Data points graph 2.0, Data points table. MEDIUM priority means that widget is using time range pickers and realtime features. Widgets: Event list. LOW priority means that widget is using realtime feature only. Widgets: Map

jsdoctags.comment: Settings indicating which features of WidgetTimeContextComponent are used by widget.

methods.name: getDateTimeContextByInterval
methods.rawdescription: Calculates date time context according to provided interval.
methods.description: Calculates date time context according to provided interval.

jsdoctags.comment: Tuple of dates- the first one is date "from" according to selected interval, second one is date "to" (now).

methods.name: isSelectableInterval
methods.rawdescription: Validates provided param for being selectable Interval id.
methods.description: Validates provided param for being selectable Interval id.

jsdoctags.comment: True if provided id is valid, selectable Interval id and false if it's not.

methods.name: isValidDateRange
methods.rawdescription:
Validates provided date "from" and date "to":
- if both dates are proper date strings
- if provided date from is earlier than date to.
methods.description:
Validates provided date "from" and date "to":

  • if both dates are proper date strings
  • if provided date from is earlier than date to.
